sentences.sContent: Additional information can be obtained from the centre.
sentences.sCn: 可以从中心获取更多信息。

sentences.sContent: ...The pending bills would spend additional money to accelerate this effort...
...and refused to let providers shift additional costs to them...
...and the majority of working professionals spend additional hours checking in with work during evenings...
...after an unnecessary round of additional consultation...
...the additional responsibilities that come with coaching likely come at the expense of time otherwise spent on planning...
...there are large additional uses of water that need to be tackled in a world of growing demand...
...trainees report a need for additional resources to help them identify a long-term career path and complete an IDP...
...but it may be less difficult than asking Congress for additional financial help...

...The figures prompted Oceana to petition the government to upgrade the level of protection for the North Atlantic loggerheads from “threatened” to “endangered”—meaning they are in danger of disappearing without additional help...
...or concerned about the additional expenses teleworking policies might incur as staff start charging their home phone bills to the business...

phrases.pCn: 追加保证金；额外的安全性
附加利益；额外利益；附加利益（人身保险）

words.tran: 添加；[数] 加法；增加物
蝰蛇（欧洲产的小毒蛇）；加算器；猪鼻蛇（北美产无毒的）
增加，添加；补充说；计算…总和

trans.tranOther: more than what was agreed or expected
